channel.title: POSLink UI Design and User Guide
channel.description: Recent content on POSLink UI Design and User Guide

item.description: Security # This page describes all implict intents that BroadPOS app can use to perform actions to select option. Enter Card Number # Action SecurityEntry.ACTION_INPUT_ACCOUNT Category SecurityEntry.CATEGORY Enter Card Number (For POSLink Manage/InputAccount) # Action SecurityEntry.ACTION_MANAGE_INPUT_ACCOUNT Category SecurityEntry.CATEGORY Enter CVV # Action SecurityEntry.ACTION_ENTER_VCODE Category SecurityEntry.CATEGORY Enter Last 4 Digits # Action SecurityEntry.ACTION_ENTER_CARD_LAST_4_DIGITS Category SecurityEntry.CATEGORY Enter All Digits # Action SecurityEntry.ACTION_ENTER_CARD_ALL_DIGITS Category SecurityEntry.CATEGORY Enter Password # Action SecurityEntry.ACTION_ENTER_ADMINISTRATION_PASSWORD Category SecurityEntry.CATEGORY

POSLink Manage UI Intents # This page describes all implict intents that BroadPOS app can use to perform Manage UI request from POSLink. # Action OptionEntry.$1 Category OptionEntry.CATEGORY Input Extras EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE The package name of BroadPOS app which started activity Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_TYPE Transaction type. Example: “CREDIT SALE” Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE The transaction mode BroadPOS is running in. Default Value is TransMode.NORMAL. Type: String Mandatory The possible values are:

Signature # This page describes all implict intents that BroadPOS app can use to perform actions to do signature. Get Signature # Action SignatureEntry.ACTION_SIGNATURE Category SignatureEntry.CATEGORY Input Extras EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE The package name of BroadPOS app which started activity Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_TYPE Transaction type. Example: “CREDIT SALE” Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE The transaction mode BroadPOS is running in. Default Value is TransMode.NORMAL. Type: String Mandatory The possible values are:
